version_description: - Fixed a bug that caused the Login window to not display properly.
- Fixed a bug that caused the Login window to not display properly.
- Fixed a bug that caused the Login window to not display properly.
- Fixed a bug that caused the Login window to not display properly.
- Fixed a bug that caused the Login window to not display properly.
- We fixed a bug that caused exported MIDI-files to not open properly in some DAWs (FL Studio, Ableton,...). The file extension of the exported MIDI-file is now .mid instead of .midi.
- We fixed a bug that caused exported MIDI-files to not open properly in some DAWs (FL Studio, Ableton,...). The file extension of the exported MIDI-file is now .mid instead of .midi.

- We fixed a bug that caused exported MIDI-files to not open properly in some DAWs (FL Studio, Ableton,...). The file extension of the exported MIDI-file is now .mid instead of .midi.

This is the biggest update of Chord Progression Generator yet.
We added:
- Seventh chords
- Harmonic minor key
- MIDI over Wifi (play and record chord progressions live in any DAW)
- Do a long-press on the piano and you will see the chord names and chord notes of the generated chord progression
- An interactive tutorial
- Updated chord progression algorithm (over 4,9 billion possible compositions now)
- Golden icon for premium users
- Bugfixes regarding in-app purchases
- and more...

- Shows mute icon when Midi over Wi-Fi is enabled
- Bugfixes

New with version 1.2.5:
- We added "bulk export" to the Liked-Tab. Now you'll be able to export multiple MIDI files at once.
- We fixed a bug that caused the app to crash at launch.
- We fixed a bug that caused the app to crash when deleting liked chord progressions.
